Table_Name: Combined Regulatory and Research Data for Corn Growers in Spain and Portugal
Description: This table consolidates EU-, national-, and regional-level policies and regulatory measures affecting corn/maize agriculture in Spain and Portugal. It includes entries on EU Deforestation Regulation, CAP Strategic Plans, GMO and water management regulations, drought relief measures, and research insights on GE corn adoption and administrative reforms. Key features include announcement and effective dates, policy purpose, investment estimates, measurable indicators, succinct textual summaries, source links, and policy type. It is complemented by metadata tables for schema details.
